item.title: FBI Investigating String of Attacks on CA Backbone - AVISP
item.description:
FBI Investigating String of Attacks on CA Backbone - AVISP

According to this USA Today video, the FBI is investigating a string of attacks on California backbone. The backbone is the infrastructure for all internet services. USA Today reports there have been at least 11 attacks on Bay Area backbone connections; including the suspected attack yesterday in San Francisco.

item.title: How Can AVisp Help You? Residential and Business Services - AVISP
item.description:
How Can AVisp Help You? Residential and Business Services - AVISP

AVisp.com offers a wide variety of internet service plans to meet the varied needs Residential and Business-Class Clients. All of our service plans are based on speeds delivered. There are no data caps / limits, overage charges, or limitations. We offer our customers flexibility, reliability, and powerful internet speeds.

item.title: "AVISP [internet services] has put a smile on our faces."
item.description:
"AVISP [internet services] has put a smile on our faces."

AVISP [internet services] has put a smile on our faces. It is so much faster than dial up, and we have received outstanding personal attention and service. Thank you AVISP!" Sincerely, Ron and Kris Dick Ron , Healdsburg, CA | May 02, 2009 Working hard on upgrades and cabling.
